TopicTitle: Duna and Ike Landing And orbital delta-v

Articles.Content:
I'm planning a manned mission to Duna and Ike inspired by Scott Manley's Duna Express and I'm going to reuse the same lander for both but I'm wondering how much Delta-v is needed to land and return from a 100 k Duna orbit and 50km Ike orbit.

Thanks in advance!

Edited March 6, 2014 by Rocket in a Can
You'll need about ~3400 all told in your lander, a little less if you're willing to use chutes when you land on Duna.
Ah, Thanks Capi! I completely forgot those charts existed.

No prob. That particular chart should be the most recent one; as far as I know it's the only one that includes data on delta-V for plane changes, which is why I prefer it over the other versions (I do like the "subway map" version on the wiki; I used that one for a very long time).
